title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Re-visioning our interconnectedness with the earth and ourselves in a time of global socio-political and environmental... <!--more--> crisis

Dr Mick Collins is a lecturer in Occupational Therapy and the Director of Admissions in the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences at the University of East Anglia in the UK.
  In the past as a therapist he specialized in acute mental health and has been a holistic life coach for over 20 years, incorporating transpersonal and spiritual dimensions of psychology into his practice.
  He is the author of “The Unselfish Spirit: Human Evolution in a Time of Global Crisis” which focuses upon how humanity as a race can collectively become more conscious about the solutions to the threats and challenges facing humanity and the earth.
  His website is EpicZoetic.co.uk
